item.description:
CELEBRATE HUMAN GREATNESS THROUGH POSITIVE THINKING II
Monday April 25, 2011 from 6-7:30PM

Greatness is intrinsic to every human being - we each possess qualities such as love, peace, wisdom, happiness and powers. But why don't we experience such qualities all the time?

We have forgotten how to see and think positive; and most of the time we think very small about ourselves.
In this interactive workshop, we will explore new methods and techniques to the art of positive thinking. Secondly, we will learn to see positive qualities in ourself and will practice to think and to speak positively about the self. And finally, while leaving behind all the negative traits that make us feel unhappy, we will also practice seeing the positive qualities in others, thus helping them to see and experience their Human Greatness that is inherent in each one of us.
And lastly, we will discover how to send powerful vibrations of positive energy to our homes, community and the world in general.

Join us in this exciting life long journey.

Monday March 7, 2011 from 6-7:30PM

Manchester Public Library
405 Pine St
Hunt Room
Manchester, NH 03104
603-624-6550 or 603-668-1821

group.name: Owning Greatness Through Raja Yoga Manchester Meetup Group

item.name: CELEBRATE HUMAN GREATNESS THROUGH POSITIVE THINKING II
